selections.name: Misty Muppet
selections.reason: Top speed figure (104) and class rating (100) make her the standout. Draws the rail which is advantageous for her running style.

selections.name: Feasible
selections.reason: Highest class rating in the field (108). Drops into a comfortable spot and should be right there at the finish.

selections.name: Lady Aberdeen
selections.reason: Possesses the highest raw speed figure (105). A dangerous threat if she can clear early.

selections.name: Kentucky Smokeshow
selections.reason: Consistent figures and fits well in this class structure. Exotic contender.

danger_horse.name: Lady Aberdeen
danger_horse.reason: Speed figure of 105 is tops in the field; if she breaks sharply, she could steal it.

selections.name: Coal Fired
selections.reason: Solid speed figure (91) and gets the services of Torres. Looks ready to break maiden.

selections.name: Turin
selections.reason: Improving type from the Asmussen barn with a competitive 93 speed figure.

selections.name: Kingscliff
selections.reason: Consistent runner who fits well at this level. Should be in the mix.

selections.name: Astro Beau
selections.reason: Matches top pick on speed figures but draws the tricky rail post.

danger_horse.name: Turin
danger_horse.reason: Asmussen trainee showing improvement; dangerous if pace heats up.

selections.name: Dark Vector
selections.reason: Tops the field with a 105 speed figure. Overcomes the wide post with superior class.

selections.name: Coastal Breeze
selections.reason: Matches the top pick with a 105 speed figure. Draws well and has Asmussen in corner.

selections.name: Mamoot
selections.reason: Consistent closer who will be picking up pieces late. Solid exotic filler.

selections.name: Tapwrits Temper
selections.reason: Very fast (104) and offers value at 6/1. Must be respected.

danger_horse.name: Coastal Breeze
danger_horse.reason: Equal top speed figure and better post position than the top pick.

selections.name: Miracle Worker
selections.reason: Offers tremendous value at 8/1 with a 107 speed figure. Strong play if he handles the rail.

selections.name: City Of Oscars
selections.reason: Massive 112 speed rating on paper makes him the one to beat, though form is variable.

selections.name: Poppa Echo
selections.reason: Consistent 102 speed figure and likely favorite. Logical contender.

selections.name: Timing Difference
selections.reason: Solid 102 speed figure and good post. Can hit the board.

danger_horse.name: City Of Oscars
danger_horse.reason: If he runs to that 112 figure, he wins by lengths.

selections.name: El Diablo Rojo
selections.reason: Dominant speed figure (106) and class (100). Looks best in this field.

selections.name: Go West
selections.reason: Next best on speed (104). Should sit a good trip outside the top pick.

selections.name: Martini Blu
selections.reason: Competitive speed (102) but draws a tough outside post.

selections.name: J J's Joker
selections.reason: Consistent type with 102 speed. Good for the bottom of exotics.

danger_horse.name: Go West
danger_horse.reason: Proven class and speed to upset if the top pick falters.

selections.name: Midnight West
selections.reason: Towering speed figure (112) sets him apart from this field. The clear horse to beat.

selections.name: Creative Minister
selections.reason: Classy runner with 107 speed. The main danger to the top selection.

selections.name: Pike Place
selections.reason: Solid 105 speed figure. Consistent and should be in the trifecta mix.

selections.name: Black Powder
selections.reason: Good inside draw and respectable speed (103). Can hold on for a share.

danger_horse.name: Creative Minister
danger_horse.reason: Has the back class to challenge the top pick on his best day.

selections.name: Color Comin' In
selections.reason: Highest speed (108) and class (119) in the race. Looks like a standout winner.

selections.name: Tiz In Sight
selections.reason: Solid contender with 102 speed. Likely to chase the top pick home.

selections.name: Our Two Girls
selections.reason: Matches Tiz In Sight on speed figures. Good exotic value.

selections.name: Front Runnin
selections.reason: Speedy type from the inside, could hang on for a minor share.

selections.name: Mendela
selections.reason: Elite speed figure (115) makes her strictly the one to beat.

selections.name: Ma Rae's Girl
selections.reason: Matches the top pick with a 115 speed figure. This race goes through these two.

selections.name: Queen's Martini
selections.reason: Best of the rest with a 105 speed figure. Likely 3rd behind the top pair.

selections.name: Miss Martini
selections.reason: Consistent 105 speed figure, rounds out the superfecta.

danger_horse.name: Ma Rae's Girl
danger_horse.reason: Identical speed figure to the top pick; could easily win this duel.

selections.name: Hicko
selections.reason: Top speed figure (104) in a balanced field. Gets the nod.

selections.name: Task
selections.reason: Strong speed (102) and class (106). Wide post is the only concern.

selections.name: Mr. Butch
selections.reason: Competitive 101 speed figure. Solid value play.

selections.name: Four O Nine
selections.reason: Classy runner (107 class rating) who fits if he can find his best form.

danger_horse.name: Task
danger_horse.reason: High class and speed; if he overcomes the post, he wins.
